contentfulBlogPost.title: Partnerships in the world of D2C– It’s time to find like-minded brands
contentfulBlogPost.seoDescription: SEO description IQPLUS! Post "Partnerships in the world of D2C– It’s time to find like-minded brands"

content.value: In the digital age much has been written about the death of traditional retail and the rise of marketplaces. A trend that is often overlooked is direct to consumer sales (D2C). Google Trends show it has more than doubled in popularity worldwide the last few years. The latest proof being Nike´s decision to pull their product from Amazon and further focus on selling direct to consumers. The internet has significantly reduced the barriers to entry and reaching consumers is easier than ever before.

A plethora of new brands have emerged, successfully selling D2C, cutting out intermediaries and in many instances all physical outlets. This allows them to offer high quality at lower prices. While that is great, there is a huge opportunity that is being missed.

title.en-US: Blog Gif - Did we just become best friends?

content.value: When going to a physical store, most customers enjoy finding complimentary pieces and accessories to what they are buying. It could be shoe polish for your new shoes, or accessories that go along with your new dress. Online however, especially when shopping from D2C focused brands, this is almost never the case. Amazon displays other products you might be interested in and Zalando lets you “complete the look”. So why doesn’t D2C brands do this? The simple answer is that they don´t produce complimentary products. However, this is where product partnerships come into play. It is time for brands to think more holistic.

Through partnering with like-minded brands that complement each other, a win-win situation can be created. Allowing others to sell your products increases sales, distribution and marketing. Selling other products that compliment yours can be great both for customer loyalty and increased revenue. Introducing your customers to a great and new range of products will likely increase customer loyalty and the rate at which they return.

The Outshifter platform enables you to easily find your perfect product match and import the products to your web shop. Through our search function you can narrow down your search criteria and find the perfect fit. Once the perfect fit is found our infrastructure lets you import products with one click. While you stay in complete control of your own image and distribution, only brands you´ve approved can sell your products and you can only sell products from brands that have approved you. Our technological infrastructure makes it seamless and smooth to stay in charge. Not to mention that you carry no additional inventory commitments for partnered products as orders are fulfilled directly through dropshipping.
Start looking for your product match today to increase your offering. It´s time to start brand dating.
